sentences.english: MUSAP is an extraction Polygonatum officinale root and rhizome.
sentences.chinese: MUSAP是從玉竹的根和根莖中提取出來的產品。

sentences.english: The invention relates to fragrant solomonseal rhizome, hawthorn fruit and apple composite beverage and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 一種玉竹山楂蘋果複合飲料及其製備方法。

sentences.english: Among of them, hunan Polygonatum odoratum are very popular.
sentences.chinese: 其中湖南的湘玉竹深受歡迎。

sentences.english: RESULTS The optimal RAPD reaction system for medical material Yuzhu(Polygonatum Odoratum) was determined.
sentences.chinese: 結果確定了適合於玉竹的最佳RAPD反應體系。

sentences.english: ObjectiveCarry out identifying a distinction to the Polygonatum sibiricum and Polygonatum odoratum collected from Mount Laoshan.
sentences.chinese: 目的對嶗山採集到的黃精與玉竹進行鑑別。

definition: root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
